page.title: 05 The Nursery Unit.
page.content: The Nursery Unit,which is part of the Primary School but is in a separate building,was opened in 1982.It is the only Nursery Unit in a rural school in Northamptonshire. Altogether,65 children come to the Nursery.They are aged between 3 and 5 years.13 of them come full time,and 26 more join them in the mornings.They go home at lunch time and 26 more come in the afternoons.The children come in with their parents at 9 o'clock or 1.15 p.m.They can choose from painting, making models,sticking,listening to stories,number games like lotto,water, sand,dough,clay,matching games,drawing, tracing,jigsaws,building with bricks and construction toys.When they go outside there is apparatus for climbing,balancing,creeping and general play.The children move on to Primary school in the year they become 5.
